main.intro: Data Engineer with 3 years of experience, expert in Python, PySpark and AWS. I transform raw data into strategic solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm Amine SABBAHI, a Senior Data Engineer with 3 years of experience at BPIFrance and La Poste. Expert in Python, PySpark and AWS, I specialize in Big Data pipeline design, software industrialization (CI/CD) and modern AI architectures (RAG, LangChain). Graduate from ESIEA in Data & AI with an exchange at the University of Michigan, I combine technical rigor and strategic vision to transform data into business value.

webdev.title: Data Pipelines & ETL
webdev.description: Design and optimization of distributed PySpark/Polars pipelines for massive data processing (Big Data).

bots.title: AI Solutions & RAG
bots.description: Development of intelligent assistants based on LangChain, vector databases and RAG architectures.

scraping.title: Cloud & Industrialization
scraping.description: Production deployment via CI/CD (GitHub Actions), AWS deployment and Docker containerization.

language_app.title: RAG Document Assistant
language_app.description: RAG architecture based on LangChain and Supabase (Vector DB) for technical documentation querying. Hybrid Search, Re-ranking and Docker deployment.

pdf_reader.title: Multi-Agent System
pdf_reader.description: Multi-agent system orchestrating autonomous workflows via OpenAI API. Full containerization with Docker.

commitment_tracker.title: Actuarial Pipelines
commitment_tracker.description: Internal Python libraries for AWS S3 data ingestion and actuarial calculations industrialization (Markov Chains, Chain Ladder).

interview_prep.title: Analytics Dashboards
interview_prep.description: Dash/Plotly applications for data visualization and strategic decision-making in enterprise.
